channel.description: Why add Universal Logout (UL) to SSO-enabled applications? Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 820 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: Content needs to be workshopped Why is this here?: Requested by product management (Jeff Taylor).
